website_summaries.verdict: A long, lightweight women's packable jacket that is ideal for fall or springtime.
pros: Long coat keeps your whole torso warm
cons: Feathers come out of the jacket and stick to clothing

customer_reviews.title: Great coat spoiled by a poor-quality zipper
customer_reviews.text: This coat is similar in weight to Patagonia's Fiona parka. I ordered the XS and it fits perfectly. The coat is well made and I like the color (Titanium) a lot. Thought I'd found a perfect lightweight winter parka until I zipped it up. The zipper won't lie flat; it curves and kinks, causing the front of the coat to bunch up and not hang smoothly. Disappointing. I'm returning the coat.
customer_reviews.author: BeckJo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful coat!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit - didn't make me look bulky but was plenty warm and very stylish
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously lame product
customer_reviews.text: I almost never write reviews on products, but when one is this lame, I feel like it's a duty. First, this coat won't keep you warm in 50 degree weather. It is trash bag thin. Second, instead of having an interior pocket or two, it has two sleeves that appear to be pockets, but are not closed on the bottom so are completely useless. Third, my wife ordered the color Titanium and it looks like the color of a battleship. Besides the attractive design of the coat as depicted on the site pictures, the product is essentially useless.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: This jacket looks NOTHING like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I overpaid for a trashbag with a calvin klein logo on it. What a joke. This jacket looks NOTHING like the picture. Way to steal our money, CK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It loses down - all the time
customer_reviews.text: the coat works well in temps ranging from 30 - 50, but it sheds down all the time. If I wear black underneath it, the black piece of clothing has small bits of down on it. I've had it over a year and have washed it according to the directions, but it still sheds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love the material and length
customer_reviews.text: This coat is thin but warm. The material has a great feel to it. I am 5’10” and it is long and sleeves r perfect length. I debated about size after reading reviews but ordered a large and glad I did. It fits perfect. (Some of the coats I already have are size large and some medium, but large in this coat is great). I am very happy with this purchase. The only thing I wish was different was a flap to cover zipper. But I love coat anyway.
customer_reviews.author: DEUCE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coat for travel - lightweight, warm, packs into a tiny space
customer_reviews.text: This coat is perfect for a multiple destination trip with different kinds of weather! It packs down into a a small provided bag that even can be smooshed further in a suitcase when you don't need it. It is also lightweight so doesn't add much to the weight of your bag. I used this coat in weather as cold as 5 degrees F, and it kept me very warm. It has nice big pockets and is comfortable to wear. I'm so glad I bought this! Please note this does seem to run big. I went one size down and it's the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: dcReader

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Received the coat on time but was disapppinted! Compared to other down coats in the same category this one did not have a hood (faux fur), no two way zipper, no zipper on size pockets, and no knit cuff to keep out cold. It runs a bit small so size up. However, look at other coats as I think you're paying for the designer name I'm returning this one for a coat with more value for the same money. I should have looked at more coats before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: gilkap

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this coat. The rosewood color is beautiful, the fit is great. I’m 5’ 6’’ and 120 pounds and the medium is perfect. No problem so far with feathers everywhere. Would like to buy the purple when available.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rescigno

customer_reviews.title: It's a garbage bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black coat and regret it instantly. It looks, feels, and sounds like a black garbage bag! It isn't as filled as expected too, so it has unnecessary wrinkles all over the coat. Very dissatisfied with this jacket. Buy a different one!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: It looks nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.text: This coat is awful. It looks nothing like the picture. I ordered the black one and it arrived the next day! Quick ship but huge disappointment. I didn't even recognize it. The zipper in the photo looks fine but IRL it is an awful bright gold zipper that seems way too wide. It is all you notice. There is very little down. It is super thin, you wouldn't wear it if it was below freezing. Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: mom24mass

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket but Terrible Price here on Amazon @ $ 179
customer_reviews.text: I feel compelled to write this review as a public service announcement. Amazon usually has good prices ?! I just purchased what appears to be the same CK Long Jacket at COSTCO for $ 49.99 ! Item # 706692. The label has the following re) materials of this Calvin Klein branded product : Filler: 90 % Duck Down / 10% Waterfowl Feathers. Of course, both the shell & lining are nylon. And, there is a removable zippered hood.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

product_meta.title: Calvin Klein Women's Chevron Quilted Packable Down Jacket
product_meta.description: Calvin Klein Outerwear Women's Size Guide Calvin Klein Outerwear Men's Size Guide Stylish detailing gives this Calvin Klein; puffer jacket well deserved fashion credentials. Quilted puffer coat boasts a lightweight down fill for warmth without added bulk. Stand collar. Full-zip closure. Long sleeves. Welt hand pockets. Longer length design. Matching packable sack included. Lined. Shell: 100% nylon;Fill: 60% down, 40% feathers;Lining: 100% nylon. Machine wash cold, dry flat. Imported. Measurements: Length: 35 in Sleeve Length: 33 in Product measurements were taken using size XS (US 2-4). Please note that measurements may vary by size.
feature_bullets: FUNCTIONALITY: Featuring a center front zipper that extends into a stand up collar to protect from cold temperatures; The jacket has two side pockets for added storage

EASY TRAVEL & STORAGE: The jacket conveniently packs into matching drawstring pouch for easy storage and travel; The pouch is compressible due to the chevron quilting making it the ideal on the go companion
WARMING FEATURES: Featuring down insulation providing added warmth and to protect against colder temperature; The jacket falls just above the knee creating a larger shield against harsh conditions
